mapper.select: SELECT ssa.id as ass_id ,ssav.id as ssav_id ,ssa.*,ssav.*,if(skav.sku_id,'1','0') as isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr ssa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id AND ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id and ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} left JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skav on skav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id and skav.sku_id = #{skuId} order by ssav.base_sale_attr_id , ssav.id
